bug.author: ohsewon
bug.summary: Request to Update Wiki Pages: URLs to get files, Change the paths
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.sec.samsung.net/myungjoo-ham></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Please add URLs to get all the files required by the examples (i.e., *.tflite, labels.txt)
If possible, we may use github.com/nnsuite/testcase/... ( as long as the files are not touched by us, we do not need to worry administrative problems.)
/dev as an example installation path is not good. Some people will really use it and possible break the system. Let's use something not harmful such as ~/lib/ or ~/test/
The requirement is to allow a developer with a clean system (a newly installed Ubuntu) to build, install, and run the example.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.sec.samsung.net/git-bot-sec></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/359>#359</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
